info.name: Firefox 4 Aero Glass IE 9 Mod
info.description: Original by H. Dmitri, enhanced by MeMKou22
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATES

Apptabs notifier
Facebook Chat notifier (red blink)
Mail and other notifier (Green glow), tab selected (Blue Glow)

UPDATES
tab color
urlbar width: maximized, normal (credits to sdrocking http://userstyles.org/users/43231)




You still NEED to rearrange your firefox UI.
the url bar width is dynamic with min. of 450 pixels wide, for multiple tabs

Very long All-in-One Glass code.
Tested with Firefox 4.
Not yet tested with older versions of Firefox with Glasser.




Credits to H.Dmitri
